promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young simple serpent steel-type wearing a ancient mask. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Slithemask, a chibi young simple serpent steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Field Trap, Metal Hook. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word serpent or steel or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, serpent-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Slithemask hides in the desert and uses Field Trap to capture prey with its Metal Hook. Stealthy and clever, it outwits rivals.
